description: Adult Hot Chocolate is for those that are young at heart and miss the good old times of being curled in your PJs while reading a book by the fireplace during the cold winter months. This drink is perfect for relaxing and chilling with your family, whether you are reading your own books or enjoying a movie together.
name: Adult Hot Chocolate
recipeIngredient: Grated chocolate, chocolate syrup, or marshmallows for additional garnish
